name: Acid Spray
description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases damage per second by a multiplier of 1.5 and armor reduction by a multiplier of 1.5.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Turns Acid Spray into a passive that automatically applies at the center of the arena when the battle begins. The Acid Spray takes up the entire arena and lasts for the entire battle.

name: Acorn Shot
description:
Fires Hoodwink's attack with an acorn at the target unit. The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.
If point targeted, a tree is created at the target position and the acorn will bounce to nearby targets. The ability may be placed on auto-cast to force this behavior.
superUpgrade: Super: +2 Acorn Shot bounces, +50% base damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Stygian Desolator: +60 damage, and attacks reduce the target's armor by 10 for 7 seconds.

name: Anchor Smash
description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases damage reduction by 20%, damage by 100 and decreases cooldown by 1 second.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants a 40% chance to cast Anchor Smash on attack.

name: Ancient Seal
description: The caster seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
superUpgrade: Super: Also applies Ancient Seal on a random enemy in 700 radius around the main target.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Reduces cooldown by 8 seconds, increases magic resistance reduction by 16%, and refills 100% of the caster's mana when the target dies while afflicted with Ancient Seal's debuff.

name: Aphotic Shield
description:
Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
superUpgrade: Super: When cast on an ally, will automatically cast on self.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Shield capacity increased by 400.

name: Arc Lightning
description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units, damaging nearby targets once.
superUpgrade: Super: Damage is increased by 110.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Timeless Relic.

name: Arcane Aura
description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for the caster.
superUpgrade: Super: +6 Mana Regen. Ally bonus factor to 4x.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Aura now grants 25% cooldown reduction.

name: Arcane Bolt
description: The caster launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on the caster's intelligence
superUpgrade: Super: Launches an additional 2 bolts to different targets within 700 radius of the target
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Whenever the hero deals damage with an ability, they passively gain an independently stacking buff that provides 0.5 armor and 2 intelligence for 35 seconds.

name: Arctic Burn
description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of 6% / 7% / 8% / 9% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her 400 additional vision range at night while soaring.
differences: Has no mana cost.
superUpgrade: Super: +12% Arctic Burn Slow, +2s Arctic Burn Burn Debuff Duration.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Arctic Burn becomes permanent. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases caster's movement speed.

name: Astral Spirit
description: The hero sends forth their Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through. When the spirit rejoins the hero, it grants bonus damage, armor, and movement speed for each unit it passed through.
superUpgrade: Super: +40 bonus damage per hero, +5 bonus damage per creep.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: When Astral Spirit returns, also grants 2 seconds of spell immunity per hero.

name: Astral Step
description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for 1.25 seconds and then detonates.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Mage Slayer. Slash crits for 200% damage, and reduces charge restore time by 4s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +2 Astral Step Charges

name: Atrophy Aura
description: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If an enemy dies while under this effect, this hero gains temporary bonus damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases damage reduction by 15%. The aura's effect radius is now extended to cover the entire arena.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Atrophy Aura now affects allies, buffing their damage by 100% of the aura owner's bonus.

name: Bash of the Deep
description: The hero will bash every 4 melee attacks or 4 ranged attacks, dealing bonus physical damage and stunning for a duration. Deals double damage against creeps.
superUpgrade: Super: Deals an extra 150 damage and instantly kills creeps on bash.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Required attacks reduced by 1.

name: Battle Trance
description:
Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within 900 range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
superUpgrade: Super: +2s Battle Trance duration, +200 bonus attack speed.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Rampage, which provides all allies with a buff: +70 attack speed if the caster is ranged, and 25% status resistance if the caster is melee.

name: Berserker's Blood
description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed, magic resistance and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.
superUpgrade: Super: +30% Berserker's Blood Regen.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Heart of Tarraque: Gains +45 Strength, +250 Health, and +1.6% Max HP Health Regen.

name: Black Hole
description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units. Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
differences: Has slightly reduced radius and damage.
superUpgrade: Super: +100 damage per second.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Refresher Orb (costs 0 mana).

name: Blade Fury
description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering this hero immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
differences: Magic immune portion of the spell is reduced in duration.
superUpgrade: Super: +100 damage per second, +75 radius, magic immunity now lasts through the entire spin.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: -8s cooldown, Blade Fury now increases movespeed by 100 and attacks enemies within its area of effect at 75% of power every 1.2 seconds.

name: Blink
description: Short distance teleportation that allows the hero to move in and out of combat.
superUpgrade: Super: The next ability cast after Blink has 80% reduced cooldown. Decreases cooldown by 2s, and releases a sonic boom when the hero blinks, at both the starting and ending location. Deals 175 damage in a 300 AoE and silences for 1.75 seconds.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants 100% bonus spell amplification for 4 seconds after blinking.

name: Bloodlust
description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Gives bonus attacks speed if cast on Ogre himself. Can be cast on towers.
differences: AI: Prioritize cast on the closest ally.
superUpgrade: Super: +25 attack speed, casting Bloodlust on an ally also buffs themselves.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Bloodlust now buffs the entire team.

name: Bloodrage
description: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
differences: Hero always casts Bloodrage on themselves.
superUpgrade: Super: When cast, also gives the closest ally hero within 800 units Bloodrage. +25 attack speed and +8% spell amplification.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Attacks from heroes with Bloodrage now also deal 1.8% of the target's maximum health as pure damage and heals for the same amount.

name: Borrowed Time
description:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
superUpgrade: Super: Reduces the cooldown by 8, +3 second duration
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: 40% damage reduction to allies in 500 AoE, the caster heals for damage taken.

name: Boundless Strike
description: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.
superUpgrade: Super: Adds a perpendicular Boundless Strike at the end of the first strike, +0.3s stun duration, and +75% crit damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Applies Bloodthorn effect to every unit hit.

name: Brain Sap
description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Heal/Damage increased by +150, cooldown reduced by 3 seconds, and applies a maximum level Enfeeble on the target.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Brain Sap is also casted on enemies within 550 radius of the primary target.

name: Burning Barrage
description: CHANNELED - Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers.
differences: Has a lower cooldown
superUpgrade: Super: +35% damage, +3 arrows fired.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Gleipnir

name: Burrowstrike
description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
superUpgrade: Super: Applies max level Caustic Finale to units hit by Burrow Strike.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: 2 charges.

name: Call of the Wild
description: The caster calls forth a Boar and a Hawk to aid in the battlefield.
differences: Both Boar and Hawk are one spell.
superUpgrade: Super: Summons both Necro 3 units, Hawks gain Dive Bomb. When casted, all your summons gains 250 health.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Summons random dominated ancient creep, +2 Hawks spawned.

name: Chain Frost
description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 3 / 4 / 5 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits.
differences: Number of bounces reduced slightly.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases damage by 70 and also creates an Ice Spire which slows enemies and Chain Frost can bounce to.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Unlimited bounces.

name: Chakra Magic
description: Restores mana to the target unit and reduces cooldowns of all abilities currently on cooldown by a fixed amount.
differences: When casted on an ally, also applies the effects on self. Is retroactive, meaning the next abilities that are cast within certain amount of seconds will also have its cooldown reduced.
superUpgrade: Super: -4s reduced cooldown, and applies a basic dispel on targeted hero. Reduces ally cooldowns by an additional 2s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Blinding Light.

name: Chakram
description: Transforms this hero's weapon into a saw blade and fires it at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted. While active the ability costs mana, and the hero loses their ability to attack.
differences: AI: Targets the furthest enemy from the hero
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Throwable Flamethrower, which allows the hero to gift a Flamethrower to an ally. +20 Chakram damage per second, +4% Chakram movement slow.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Second Chakram.

name: Chaos Strike
description: Caster's attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength, in addition to a lifesteal for percentage of the damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases the proc chance by 10% and the lifesteal by 20%.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Becomes an aura. Allies proc chance is reduced by 50%.

name: Chaotic Offering
description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for 1 second. The Golem lives for 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
superUpgrade: Super: Summons Golem on death.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Calls 2 Golems with reduced stats.

name: Charge of Darkness
description: The hero fixes their sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects, dealing a Greater Bash to the target upon impact. If the targeted unit dies, the hero will change their target to the nearest enemy hero to that location.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Spell Immunity while charging. Gains +600 bonus charge speed and reduced cast point. All enemy units passed through will be hit by a Greater Bash.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Instantly resets its cooldown upon its target's death. Gains the ability Greater Bash.

name: Chemical Rage
description:
Enter into a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
differences: Grants faster BAT for melee heroes.
superUpgrade: Super: +50 health regeneration, +150 movement speed.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Chemical Rage now lasts for the entire round. Gains Berserk Potion.

name: Chronosphere
description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it. Only the caster and any units he controls are unaffected. Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.
superUpgrade: Super: Caster gains 200 attack speed while inside.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Allies can move inside Chronosphere with -550% movement, attack, and cast speed.

name: Cold Embrace
description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Now roots and disarms targets instead of stunning them.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Increases base heal by 25, and releases a max level Splinter Blast projectile on all enemies in 1200 radius around the target, dealing 340 damage and stunning them for 2 seconds.

name: Corrosive Haze
description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: Corrosive Haze is now undispellable and permanent. Reduces healing/regen/lifesteal by 50%.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Spawns a 600 radius puddle, giving allies in the puddle 30 HP regen, 10 armor, and 40% status resistance.

name: Corrosive Skin
description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
superUpgrade: Super: Doubles attack speed slow and bonus magic resistance.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Becomes 1200 radius aura.

name: Counter Helix
description: When attacked, the caster has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Vanguard. Counter Helix will proc on attacks with indepedent cooldown.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Crimson Guard. Increases Counter Helix Chance by 10%, and damage by 120.

name: Coup de Grace
description: The caster refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases the critical strike chance in 7% and grants Fan of Knives.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Every crit casts Fan of Knives.

name: Culling Blade
description: The hero spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and the hero and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
superUpgrade: Super: +1 armor per stack, and +150 kill threshold.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Successful Culling Blade kills also grant 2s of physical damage immunity to all allies.

name: Curse of Avernus
description: The caster strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit 4 times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost.
superUpgrade: Super: Reduces hit count to 3 attacks, and increases slow by -50%
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Can gain stacks while an existing debuff is still active.

name: Dark Pact
description:
After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself. Slark only takes 0% of the damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
differences: Caster does not deal damage to himself.
superUpgrade: Super: Purges buffs from enemies, +150 area of effect, +150 damage, -1s cooldown.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Entire team Dark Pacts ( damage).

name: Death Pulse
description: The caster releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
differences: Deals slightly reduced damage, but has increased radius.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases heal by 35 and reduces cooldown by 2.5s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Each pulse bounces once on random target.

name: Death Ward
description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: +100 attack range, +60 attack damage. Hero gains Voodoo Switcheroo.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Death Ward attacks gain True Strike and bounces towards the closest enemy heroes within 650 units of the previous target. Cannot bounce on the same enemy twice.

name: Decay
description: The hero steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as they claim the enemy's strength for themselves.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases strength steal by +6.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Decay triggers 2 additional times at the targeted location 3 seconds apart.

name: Demonic Cleanse
description:
Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration. At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
superUpgrade: Super: Grants 3 charges.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Demonic Purge.

name: Demonic Purge
description:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration. The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel.
differences: Applies a Break by default.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants 3 charges.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Demonic Cleanse (3 charges, costs 50 mana).

name: Dispersion
description: Damage done to this hero is reflected on their enemies, leaving it unharmed. The damage lessens with distance.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants the ability to passively cast Spectral Dagger whenever the hero takes a total of 300 damage, targeting a random enemy. Cooldown: 7s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Passive Spectral Dagger cooldown reduced to 1s.

name: Dispose
description: Marci grabs an allied or enemy target and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and slowing the unit if it's an enemy. Any enemy units in the landing area will also be damaged and slowed.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases cast range by 225.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Gives 120 attack speed bonus to units attacking the main target. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Disruption
description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration. Upon returning, 2 illusions of the banished unit are created under caster's control.
superUpgrade: Super: Applies Soul Catcher on enemies.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Has 2 charges.

name: Dissimilate
description: The caster temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.
superUpgrade: Super: Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate and increases damage by 175.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Stuns affected enemies for 2.5 seconds.

name: Double Edge
description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.
superUpgrade: Super: Slow enemies by 25% for 2s and increase caster's strength by 30% per hero hit that lasts 15s. Duration refreshes per stack, up to a max of 5 stacks. Increases strength as damage by 0%.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: No longer deals self-damage. Grants 0.5% HP regen per stack. Increases radius by 100.

name: Dragon Blood
description: The life blood of the caster improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
superUpgrade: Super: +12 Health Regen and +12 Armor.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: 15% chance of casting max level Breath Fire at enemy when attacked.

name: Dragon Slave
description: The caster channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases damage by 150 and reduces cooldown by 2.5s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Spawns a Helm of the Overlord buffed Black Dragon where the spell ends.

name: Duel
description: The hero starts an epic duel against a target enemy hero, where both heroes are forced to attack each other for a short duration. Neither hero can use items or abilities. If the casting hero's opponent dies during the Duel, the hero gains permanent bonus damage.
differences: Duel does not grant damage to enemies upon losing Duel.
superUpgrade: Super: +15 bonus damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +15 bonus reward damage. Reduces cooldown by 20 seconds and duelers take 50% less damage from other units.

name: Earthshock
description: The caster leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and low alls enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: Causes Earthshock to apply a 1.5 second Enrage buff on yourself. +500 radius, -s CD.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Entire team Earthshocks for half values (other than duration). Affects heroes only.

name: Elder Dragon Form
categories: PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Allies Yes, Enemies No
description:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20 / 20 / 20 / 30 poison damage per second for 5 seconds. Works on structures.
LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 350 radius for 60% / 60% / 60% / 100% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by 40% / 40% / 40% / 60% and attack speed by 40 / 40 / 40 / 60 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Fireball.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Transforms into Black Dragon. Black Dragon deals 30 Corrosive Damage, 100% Splash Damage, 60% Slow amount, 25% increased Magic Resistance, and has free pathing.

name: Empower
description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack. The caster receives 75% larger bonus. Always apply effects on self
differences:
When casted on an ally, also applies the effects on self. Has no cast time.

AI: Prioritize cast on the closest ally.
superUpgrade: Super: +10% cleave, +10% damage, +10s duration, +200 cleave radius.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Empower is a global aura.

name: Enchant Totem
description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 75 bonus attack range on the next attack.
superUpgrade: Super: +100% bonus damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Becomes a passive ability. -1.5s cooldown.

name: Epicenter
description: After 2 seconds, the hero sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
superUpgrade: Super: +20 damage, +100 base pulse radius, +5 pulses. Passively emits a pulse from the hero for every 700 units travelled.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Cast time is removed. Enemies within 300 of this hero take 2x more damage from Epicenter.

name: Essence Flux
description: Passively grants you a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.
differences: Has slightly reduced mana gain.
superUpgrade: Super: +300 cast range, and +300 attack range.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants up to 100% Spell Amplification, based on the percentage of mana you have remaining.

name: Essence Shift
description: The hero steals the life essence of enemy heroes with their attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.
differences: Essence Shift will not give permanent agility until its Super upgrade.
superUpgrade: Super: If the hero kills an enemy affected by Essence Shift, they permanently gain 1 agility.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Essence Shift can also proc with spells, each having a 2s cooldown to affect the same unit again.

name: Eye of the Storm
description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
superUpgrade: Super: -0.2s strike interval.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +2 strike targets.

name: Fade Bolt
description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage. Each jump deals less damage.
superUpgrade: Super: -4s cooldown, +10% damage reduction. Applies an instant attack on every unit hit.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Fade Bolt steals attack damage.

name: False Promise
description:
Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is amplified. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
differences: Has slightly reduced duration.
superUpgrade: Super: +15 armor during False Promise, +1.5s duration, -30s cooldown.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Target gains 25% attack lifesteal and 25% spell lifesteal during False Promise.

name: Feast
description: Lifestealer's attacks deal damage and provide heal for a percentage of his target's max health.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Open Wounds: rends an enemy unit, granting 50% lifesteal to units attacking that target, and dealing 2% of the target's max health per attack from real heroes. After the target receives 500 damage, Open Wounds festers and spreads a random enemy in a 700 radius.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Becomes a global aura.

name: Feral Impulse
description: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of this hero and all units under their control.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases bonus damage by 25% and HP regen by 10.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Attacks from units affected with Feral Impulse applies a stacking -1 armor debuff.

name: Fervor
description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed. If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.
superUpgrade: Super: +10 attack speed per stack.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Satanic.

name: Fiend's Grip
description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
superUpgrade: Super: +5% max mana drain, +6s channel time.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Cooldown reduced by 45 seconds. Spawns two illusions that also channel Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions takes 200% more damage and immediately die if their channeling is interrupted. Fiend's Grip damage does not stack.

name: Fiery Soul
description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time caster casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 8 seconds.
differences: Generates stacks when casting spells instead of when damaging enemies with spells.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases the attack speed bonus by 20 and the movement speed bonus by 2%.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Stacks infinitely and grants 2 stacks per spell cast instead of 1.

name: Finger of Death
description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
differences: Has greatly increased duration to gain Finger of Death kill stacks.
superUpgrade: Super: +70 Max HP and +20 more bonus damage per Finger of Death kill.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: 20 seconds less cooldown. 100 more base damage and is cast on all enemies in a 325 radius of the primary target.

name: Firesnap Cookie
description: The hero feeds a potent cookie to themselves or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.
superUpgrade: Super: Firesnap cookies become even more potent, getting increased jump range and launching a Mortimer Kiss to the landing destination. Heals units for 200 and grants 200 max health.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: For 3 seconds, the target gets thrown an additional Firesnap Cookie every 1 seconds.

name: Fissure
description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
differences: Allies can freely walk on Fissure.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases range by 320 and damage by 80.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Aftershock (only works for spells cast while on the fissure). Also creates a secondary perpendicular fissure in front of the first unit hit.

name: Flak Cannon
description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks. Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike. Lasts 10 seconds or until the attacks are used.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Side Gunner: attacks enemy units within 700 units every 1.2 seconds, prioritizing furthest unit away within its range.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Side Gunner attacks becomes Flak Cannon attacks.

name: Flame Guard
description: The caster surrounds themselves with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed. Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around the caster while Flame Guard is active. If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
superUpgrade: Super: +50 Damage Per Second and +280 Magic Damage Absorbed.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Passive: Twice as powerful Radiance effect.

name: Flesh Golem
description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.
differences: Caster becomes melee in Flesh Golem form.
superUpgrade: Super: Reduces Flesh Golem Cooldown by -30s and causes caster to spawn one zombie on each attack while transformed. Spawned zombies lasts 15s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Applies Arcanist's Armor effect.

name: Flesh Heap
description: Gives the hero a guaranteed damage block against all types of damage. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time this hero kills an enemy Hero or it dies in their vicinity.
differences: Does not gain Strength permanently until Super.
superUpgrade: Super: Permanently gains +2 Strength per enemy that dies in 450 range.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Giant's Ring.

name: Focus Fire
description: Channels the wind to gain 450 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Maelstrom. -16% Focus Fire damage reduction.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Focus Fire has no mana cost, and kills reset cooldown.

name: Fortune's End
description:
Gathers the hero's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge debuffs.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
differences: Fortune's End has an instant cast time with maximum power.
superUpgrade: Super: Applies Purifying Flames to all enemies and allies within the effect radius of the main target, dealing 360 magical damage. This applies before the dispel. Heals 44 health per second over 9 seconds.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Applies Rain of Destiny, centered on the main target. Heals/Damages allies/enemies for 60 per second over 10 seconds. While inside Rain of Destiny, allies/enemies have their heal amplification increased/reduced by 25%.

name: Freezing Field
description: CHANNELED - Surrounds the caster with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts 10 seconds.
differences: Radius and damage reduced slightly.
superUpgrade: Super: +50 damage. Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this. Decreases interval duration by 0.02.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Linken's Sphere. Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over 1.75s.

name: Frost Arrows
description: Adds a freezing effect to the hero's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage. Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.
differences: Has no mana cost.
superUpgrade: Super: +15 bonus damage, Frost Arrows now apply Hypothermia stacks. Grants Dragon Lance.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Hero attacks now splinter up to 2 enemies within 375 radius of the main target with 50% reduced damage.

name: Frost Shield
categories: PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Allies Yes, Enemies No
description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
superUpgrade: Super: +10% damage reduction and provides +50 HP Regen.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Frost Shield casts Shivas and gives Shivas Aura while active.

name: Frostbite
description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
superUpgrade: Super: Duration increased by 1.25 seconds, affected targets take 25% extra damage for the duration of the debuff.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Ice Age: when target unit dies, they shatter, applying Frostbite to every unit globally. Frostbite DPS increased by 100.

name: Fury Swipes
description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 8 / 12 / 16 / 20 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
superUpgrade: Super: +12 Fury Swipes stack damage, debuff now lasts for the duration of the round.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Every 2 attacks on an enemy applies 1 stack to all other enemies.

name: Ghostship
description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
differences: Has reduced damage, and damage reduction scales per level.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Tidal Wave. +10% damage reduction.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Summons 2 more ships after the first, each arriving 3.5 seconds after the previous.

name: Glaives of Wisdom
description: The hero enchants their attacks with their wisdom, dealing additional damage based on their Intelligence. The hero temporarily steals their target's Intelligence with each hit.
differences: Does not steal Intelligence permanently until Super.
superUpgrade: Super: Permanently gains +2 intelligence when an enemy dies within 925 radius of this hero.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Glaives bounce once, dealing 50% attack damage. +15% intelligence to damage.

name: Global Silence
description: The hero stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.
differences: Reduced duration.
superUpgrade: Super: Applies Curse of the Silent to all affected enemies.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +2s silence duration.

name: God's Rebuke
description: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Bonus damage is added when hitting heroes. Has True Strike.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases crit by 65 and slow duration by 1.5s. Reduces cooldown by 4s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Targets are stunned for 1s and break for 1s.

name: Grave Chill
description: Drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself and nearby controlled units.
differences: Works on all summons.
superUpgrade: Super: Targeted unit is disarmed. Reduces cooldown by 3s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Also grants the buff to allies in 500 radius.

name: Grow
description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
superUpgrade: Super: Removes attack speed reduction.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Belch Exterior: grants 30% status resist, and any time a unit hits hero, there is a 30% chance they get belched on, and get stunned for 2s.

name: Gust
description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to the caster.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases radius by 250 and reduces the cooldown by 4.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Silence also makes enemies miss 100% of their attacks. Doubles the knockback max distance.

name: Hand of Gaben
description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for 8 seconds afterwards.
superUpgrade: Super: Reduces cooldown by 40s, increases heal by 280 and grants Mekansm.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Mekansm becomes Greaves. When used, also Hard Dispels globally.

name: Heavenly Grace
description:
Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them increased Strength and Health Regeneration. Always apply effects on self.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
differences: When casted on an ally, also applies the effects on self. Grants 50% status resistance.
superUpgrade: Super: Provides 50% status resistance. Plus 20 health regen bonus, -2s cooldown.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Plus 50 strength bonus, undispellable.

name: Hex
description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
superUpgrade: Super: -3 second cooldown, and applies a Break.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Becomes 400 AoE ability.

name: Icarus Dive
description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
differences: Doesn't cost health to cast, and has increased damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Applies max level Fire Spirits debuff on each unit hit and grants the caster magic immunity during Dive.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Drops multiple Meteor Hammer at 0.3s interval during the Dive.

name: Ice Blast
description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.
differences: Debuff is shorter, but damage over time is increased.
superUpgrade: Super: +4% kill threshold.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Cold Feet is cast on enemies who are affected by Ice Blast, dealing 90 damage per second and stuns for 3.5 seconds if the enemy doesn't move away from the initial cast point.

name: Ice Shards
description: The caster compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: Reduces the cooldown by 6s. Enemies trapped within an ice shard suffer from 40% slow and take 60 damage per second. Increases Ice Shards depth by 300 units.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Damage per second and movespeed affect entire arena while an Ice Shard is active.

name: Impetus
description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is. The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.
differences: Has increased mana cost and slightly reduced damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Specialist's Array. +6% distance as damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Sproink.

name: Infernal Blade
description: The hero lands an infernal attack, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.6 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
differences: Applies a Break by default.
superUpgrade: Super: +1.2s ministun duration, +2.1% max HP burn, and bonus damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Infernal Blade's effects are applied to all enemies within 500 radius of the primary target.

name: Ink Swell
description: The caster shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After 3 seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.
differences: AI: targets frontliners in cast range. Otherwise, closest unit. Has max cast range at all levels, and slightly reduced radius.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases radius by 150, movement speed bonus by 16%, damage by 40% and reduces cooldown by 5s. Heal the target for 40% of the damage dealt. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispell.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants 2 charges.

name: Inner Beast
description: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Vladmir's aura. Increases attack speed by 15.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Wraith Pact aura. Increases attack speed by 15.

name: Inner Fire
description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies from this hero to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.
superUpgrade: Super: Heals 50% of damage dealt to heroes and 10% of the damage dealt to creeps. Disarm duration increased by 1s. Cooldown reduced by 3 seconds. Debuff also reduces movement speed by 40%. Cast point is removed.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Units affected by the debuff cannot heal for the duration of it.

name: Insatiable Hunger
description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases the damage 50 bonus by and the lifesteal by 50%
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Every 4 attacks applies a max level Silken Bola to enemy

name: Jingu Mastery
description: The caster's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, the caster earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.
superUpgrade: Super: +130 damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Spawns a stone soldier near you every 2.5s.

name: Kraken Shell
description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
superUpgrade: Super: Increases damage block by 40 and reduces the damage treshold by 100.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Blademail.

name: Laser
description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.
superUpgrade: Super: +100 damage, +2 duration.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Pierces Spell Immunity. Upgrades Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +200 cast range and reducing the main target's size and current health by 10% (stacking) if it's a hero. The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.

name: Leech Seed
description: The caster plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.
differences: Multiple Leech Seed debuffs can be placed on the same unit simultaneously.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases movement slow by 15% and damage/heal per second by 100.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Leech Seed lasts indefinitely.

name: Life Break
description:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them. While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
differences: AI: Targets farthest unit away.
superUpgrade: Super: Deals 1x of self damage to enemy.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Heaven's Halberd. Life Break taunts the target for 3 seconds.

name: Life Drain
description:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, the caster drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If the caster has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, the caster will drain his own health into his ally.
differences: AI: heals allies if they're low HP, but only if caster is above 90% HP.
superUpgrade: Super: For every 1.5 seconds of channel, another secondary Life Drain is created targeting another random enemy hero.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Removes cooldown and increases damage by 200.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.
superUpgrade: Super: Cast range increased by 1000. Grants Nimbus. Lightning Bolt now stuns for 1 seconds.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Lightning Bolt now damages all enemies within 325 radius of its cast location.

name: Lil' Shredder
description: Heats up a mounted turret to rapidly fire 6 fixed-damage attacks. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.
superUpgrade: Super: Uses own attack damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: 3x multishot.

name: Lucent Beam
description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants an instant attack at the beam's position towards a nearby enemy in 500 range. Increases Lucent Beam's damage by 100 and cast range by 325. Also reduces mana cost by 50 and cooldown by 3.5.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Calls forth a mini Eclipse, causing beams to bounce 4 times within 675 range, dealing 15% less damage per bounce. Lasts 0.8 seconds.

name: Luminosity
description: After 3 attacks, the caster powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within 650 units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for 35% of the amount.
superUpgrade: Super: Requires 1 less attack to proc. Increases by 40% the critical damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Lifesteal increased by 200%. Grants a double attack every 5 seconds.

name: Lunar Blessing
description: Increases the attack damage for Luna and nearby allied heroes. At night Lunar Blessing is global, and Luna is blessed with increased vision range.
superUpgrade: Super: Gains +4 damage per round after upgraded.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Bongo Drums: Drums of Endurance passive and active effects, but the attack speed bonus is equal to the Lunar's Blessing damage bonus.

name: Magic Missile
description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases damage by 200, breaks for duration of stun and pierces spell immunity.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Bounces infinite times, but only once to each unit.

name: Magnetic Field
description: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that grants bonus attack speed and protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases the attack speed bonus by 40, also pushes enemies out of the area when cast, and provides allies in it with +40% Magic Resistance. Slows enemies inside by 30%.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +200 radius and damage is delayed by 2.5s.

name: Mana Break
description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
values: MOVE SPEED SLOW ON FULL DRAIN: 25% / 30% / 40%
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Manta Style.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Automatically casts Mana Void if the target is out of mana. This effect has a 5 second cooldown.

name: Mana Shield
description: Creates a shield that absorbs 70% of incoming damage in exchange for the hero's mana. Provides bonus mana capacity.
superUpgrade: Super: When the hero spends 30% of their maximum mana on Mana Shield, it automatically casts a Mystic Snake on the last unit that damaged this hero.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Mystic Snake petrifies for 1.3 seconds. Targets affected are stunned and take 55% extra physical damage for the duration of the debuff.

name: Meat Hook
description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
differences: Hook only affects enemy heroes.
superUpgrade: Super: Launches two extra hooks to either side of the main one. Increases damage by 120, and reduces cooldown by 4.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Units hit are max level Ruptured during hook.

name: Mirror Image
description: Creates multiple images of the caster under their control.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Diffusal Blade. Reduces cooldown by 10, and increases outgoing damage by 13%.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Riptide: every 6 attacks (including illusions), the caster and their images will hit all nearby units with a 55 damage wave that lowers armor by 8 for 4 seconds. Increases illusion count by 1.

name: Mist Coil
categories: PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Allies Yes, Enemies No
description: The caster releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of caster's health.
differences: AI: Prioritize cast on allies with missing health.
superUpgrade: Super: Hits in 1000 AOE around target and doesn't hurt caster.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Performs an instant attack and applies a basic dispel and Solar Crests on every unit hit. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Moment of Courage
description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.
superUpgrade: Super: +8% proc chance and +15% lifesteal.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Moment of Courage can proc on attack with a separate cooldown.

name: Moon Glaives
description: Empowers the hero's attacks, causing their attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
superUpgrade: Super: -8% damage reduction per bounce. +1 bounces.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Butterfly.

name: Mortimer Kisses
description: The caster launches a barrage of firespit globs over 5.5 seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. The caster has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of 600.
superUpgrade: Super: +20% slow, and +2 kisses launched. Given Gobble Up ability.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: No longer requires channeling.

name: Multishot
description: Channeling. Releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.75 seconds.
differences: Applies all attack modifiers -- not just Frost Arrows.
superUpgrade: Super: +2 waves. +2 arrows per wave.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Gains Eye of Skadi.

name: Mystic Flare
description: The caster uses their ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to their adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.2 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within 700 range. Heroes will take priority.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Increases total damage by 450 and causes damage to no longer split between enemies.

name: Nature's Attendants
description: A cloud of wisps heals the caster and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 12 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases heal by 20 and wisp count by 5. Adds 3 permanent wisps.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Summons another swarm of evil attendants that damages enemies.

name: Nature's Call
description: Spawn number of Treants under the command of the caster.
differences: Doesn't require trees to make
superUpgrade: Super: 2.5x Treant HP/Damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Treants become Greater Treants.

name: Nether Swap
description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take 50 damage. Allied swapped units receive less damage for a short duration.
superUpgrade: Super: Cooldown reduced by -20 seconds, damage reduction buff increased by +15%.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: After Nether swap is cast, fears enemies in a 700 area of effect for 1.5 seconds.

name: Nethertoxin
description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.
differences: Has reduced duration.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases maximum damage by 130.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Enemy units affected by Nethertoxin is silenced.

name: Omnislash
description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
differences: Has reduced jump radius.
superUpgrade: Super: +1.5s duration.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: The hero has a 20% to perform a 0.8s Omnislash on attack against their target. This cannot proc while Omnislashing.

name: Overcharge
description: Io gains bonus attack speed, spell amplification, and HP Regen based on max health. If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
superUpgrade: Super: The closest ally will also gain Overcharge.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Overcharge now lasts 16 seconds, and grants +2% extra HP regen.

name: Overload
description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on caster's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
differences: Overload accumulates from spell casts and releases all of its stacks on proc, multiplying the damage done.
superUpgrade: Super: Allies within 750 range grant Overload charges.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Overload attacks bounces 2 times.

name: Overpower
description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
superUpgrade: Super: +3 Overpower attacks.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Gains Abyssal Blade.

name: Paralyzing Cask
description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals 200% damage to creeps.
differences: Has slightly reduced stun duration.
superUpgrade: Super: +4 cask bounces.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Applies Maledict on hit targets for 12 seconds.

name: Phantasm
description:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the hero from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are strong illusions that deal 100% damage, but take 325% damage.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
superUpgrade: Super: +1 illusion and Phantasm lasts until round ends.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Also summons a phantasmal copy of all allies.

name: Phantom Strike
description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed and lifesteal while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
differences: AI: Targets backline.
superUpgrade: Super: +3s duration.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Each Phantom Strike casts Stifling Dagger on every unit in 1150 AOE.

name: Phase Shift
description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
superUpgrade: Super: Casting Phase Shift makes the caster perform an instant attack on all enemies within its attack range + 200.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: While in Phase Shift, the caster performs its Super effect every 1s.

name: Plague Ward
description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic.
superUpgrade: Super: Increased health and base damage by 2.5x, cooldown reduced by 1.5 seconds. Creates 2 wards per cast.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Wards gains the passive spells of the caster.

name: Plasma Field
description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases radius by 400 and damage min/max by 30.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Always deals maximum damage and pushes enemies outward up to 40% of the maximum distance when expanding.

name: Poison Attack
description: The hero adds an intense venomous effect to their normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 5 times.
differences: Has no mana cost, and more magic resist reduction.
superUpgrade: Super: +10% magic resistance reduction per stack. Passively grants +150 attack range.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +3 max debuff stacks, Poison Attack now also reduces target's armor by 1 per stack.

name: Press The Attack
description:
Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
differences: AI: always uses on self.
superUpgrade: Super: Also applies to all allies within a 400 unit radius from the target. The caster also gains the buff if not affected.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Also applies spell immunity for 2 seconds.

name: Pulse Nova
description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Bloodstone.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Nihilism.

name: Pulverize
description: CHANNELED - Primal Beast channels his rage, grabbing the target enemy and slamming them into the ground repeatedly, damaging and mini-stunning any enemies caught in the AoE. Lasts 2.3 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: 2x channel time, and pierces Spell Immunity.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: During Pulverize, every 0.75 seconds, 3 rocks fall around the arena, dealing 325 damage and stunning for 1.75 seconds in a 255 radius.

name: Purification
categories: PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Allies Yes, Enemies No
description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
differences: AI: Prioritize cast on the closest ally.
superUpgrade: Super: +160 Heal/Damage, -2s cooldown.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Target also receives 6s of Guardian Angel.

name: Quill Spray
description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around the hero. Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.
differences: Quills always casts off cooldown -- even if nobody is in range.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Hairball and increases quill stack damage by 20.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants 40% spell lifesteal.

name: Rage
description:
Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, and gaining increased movement speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel.
differences: Duration reduced slightly.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases movement speed by 20% and duration by 3s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Reduces cooldown by 11 seconds (has no downtime).

name: Ravage
description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
differences: Has slightly reduced radius.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases stun duration by 1s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Ravage comes back in, stunning a second time.

name: Reactive Armor
description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor. Heroes grant double the amount.
superUpgrade: Super: +12 stack limit, +6s stack duration.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: 10% chance to cast Whirling Death when attacked.

name: Reality Rift
description: Teleports the hero, any images they have, and the target unit to a point along the line between them and the target. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for 6 seconds.
differences: AI: targets backline.
superUpgrade: Super: Pierces spell immunity, +1000 cast range.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Now pulls target directly to the hero, 2x armor reduction.

name: Reaper's Scythe
description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If the caster kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to the caster.
superUpgrade: Super: +9 HP regen per stack, +3 mana regen per stack, and +100 cast range. If the target dies under Reaper's Scythe, the caster regains health and mana equal to their current health and mana.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: 100% of Reaper Scythe's damage is distributed to all enemies within 400 radius.

name: Refraction
description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage. The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
superUpgrade: Super: +100 damage per instance.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +8 Refraction instances.

name: Resonant Pulse
description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.
differences: AI: At Gaben, Resonant Pulse is only casted when a non-silenced hero is within cast range.
superUpgrade: Super: +100 damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Now has a maximum of 2 charges and silences enemies hit for 2 seconds.

name: Rolling Boulder
description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.5s delay, rolls toward the target location, dealing 30 + 100% STR damage and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.
differences: AI: targets backliners. Automatically places Stone Remnant in front on cast.
superUpgrade: Super: Plus 150 + 100% STR damage, +1s stun.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Gives 80% Status Resist for 2 seconds.

name: Rot
description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
superUpgrade: Super: +100 damage, +175 radius, +14% move slow, and 25% heal reduction on affected enemies.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Eternal Shroud.

name: Sacred Arrow
description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 3.7 / 4.3 / 4.9 / 5.5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 180 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
superUpgrade: Super: Sacred Arrow spawns 300 damage Starstorm meteors towards enemies within 500 radius of itself and on targets it hits. -2s cooldown.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +1 arrow on each side of the main Arrow. +200 Starstorm meteor damage.

name: Searing Arrows
description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
differences: Has no mana cost.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Monkey King Bar.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Burning Army, whose skeletons fire arrows that proc your instant attacks.

name: Shadow Dance
description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark. Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.
superUpgrade: Super: +1s duration, +50 attack speed while under Shadow Dance's effect.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Depth Shroud.

name: Shadow Realm
description: The caster recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable. Their next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long they remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after 3.5 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases duration by 2s and decreases cooldown by 2s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Attacking no longer takes you out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.

name: Shapeshift
description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40% chance to deal a critical strike doing 160% / 190% / 220% damage.
differences: Shapeshift is permanent. Instant cast time. Caster becomes melee when Shapeshift is used.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Overwhelming Blink. Jumps to enemy unit closest to backline.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Applies Wolf Bite to the closest ally in 600 radius.

name: Sharpshooter
description:
Caster charges up and fires a deadly bolt, dealing heavy damage, break and slow to an enemy Hero. The damage and debuff duration scale up to max after 2.25 seconds, and the bolt is fired automatically after 5 seconds.
Caster is knocked backwards for a distance of 350 from the force of the shot.
differences: 25% faster charge/projectile speed by default.
superUpgrade: Super: Projectile speed and the bolt pierces through all units.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Hunter's Boomerang. Decreases cooldown of Sharpshooter by 20s for every unit that dies under the debuff.

name: Shockwave
description: Sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line, pulling them forward and slowing them for a brief period.
superUpgrade: Super: +50 width and +150 range. Shockwave erupts after 1.5 seconds, dealing 50% of Shockwave's damage, reducing movement speed by 50% and base armor by 50% for 5 seconds.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Enemies hit by Shockwave are Horn Tossed to the caster.

name: Sidekick
description: Marci's loyalty helps ensure survival, imbuing a chosen allied hero and herself with lifesteal and attack damage.
superUpgrade: Super: +25% lifesteal. Buffed heroes also gain Spell Immunity for 1.5 seconds.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Buffed heroes also heal from their partner's Sidekick lifesteal.

name: Sleight of Fist
description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location. Deals bonus damage to heroes.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Desolator and gains True Strike.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +2 charges.

name: Snowball
description: The hero rolls into a snowball. Allies within a 200 radius are grabbed into the snowball. Any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.
differences: Snowball immediately launches after casting. Hero targets the furthest enemy away from the caster.
superUpgrade: Super: -8s cooldown, +120 base damage. Heroes coming outside of Snowball gain 100 attack speed for 3 seconds.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: When Snowball finishes, it releases 8 Ice Shards around the caster, each dealing 280 magical damage.

name: Soul Rip
description: The caster rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.
superUpgrade: Super: +25 damage/heal per unit.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Becomes a 500 AOE spell (can work on allies & enemies at the same time). Gain Crimson Guard.

name: Soulbind
description: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Dark Portrait.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Binds 3 units.

name: Spear of Mars
description: Caster throws a legendary Spear with deadly precision through the entire arena, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. When the skewered hero hits the arena wall, they will be impaled to it and stunned.
superUpgrade: Super: Impales up to 2 units and leaves a fire trail behind for 10 seconds. Deals 35 damage per second and slows by 20%. Debuff lingers for 2 seconds. Increases damage by 100 and stun duration by 1s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Spear range increased to 3000, and bounces off the arena wall 2 times. Skewered units are pinned at the wall before the bounce.

name: Spell Steal
description: Caster studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Caster can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies, and stolen spells last longer on enemies.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants 25s cooldown reduction and 20% spell amplification to stolen spells.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Allows for up to 2 spells. Increases cast range by 400.

name: Spiked Carapace
description:
When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.

While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.
differences: Has reduced stun duration.
superUpgrade: Super: +1.5s stun duration.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +300% damage reflection.

name: Spirit Lance
description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
superUpgrade: Super: Cooldown reduced by 4 seconds, and cast range increased by 225. Spirit Lance bounces once on an enemy within 750 radius, prioritizing heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage by +40%
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Octarine Core, +45 to base stat.

name: Spirit Siphon
description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.
superUpgrade: Super: +1 max health siphoned, -20s charge replenish time, applies a 20% movement slow.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +1 charges. Causes enemies continuously siphoned for 3 seconds to gain fear for 1.5 seconds.

name: Split Earth
description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
differences: Cast point is twice as fast.
superUpgrade: Super: Casts level 2 Lightning Storm on every unit hit by Split Earth.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location three additional times, with a 5 second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by 75.

name: Stampede
categories: PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Allies Yes, Enemies No
description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.
superUpgrade: Super: Cooldown reduced by -50 seconds, enemies hit by Stampede will be stunned for 1.5 seconds.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Increases duration by 1s, Stampede now also grants 40% damage reduction for all allies under its effect.

name: Starbreaker
description: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.
superUpgrade: Super: Gains spell immunity during Starbreaker. +30 swipe damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Starbreaker now has 2 charges. +150 swipe and smash radius.

name: Static Field
description: The caster shocks any enemy hit by his abilities, causing damage proportional to their current health.
differences: Has a cooldown for each ability to trigger Static Field.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases health reduction by 2%.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Performs a Heavenly Jump on the spot every time it procs, dealing damage to two targets.

name: Static Link
description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
differences: Increases the caster's attack range to always be able to hit while linked.
superUpgrade: Super: +5 damage drain rate, and +7s buff duration.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Carry 2 charges. Link duration will last for the whole round.

name: Sticky Napalm
description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area. Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks. Applies a small amount of damage with each cast.
superUpgrade: Super: Attacks apply a stack of Sticky Napalm in a 375 AOE around target.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Stacks infinitely.

name: Stone Gaze
description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed. If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone. Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus physical attack damage.
superUpgrade: Super: +1s duration, and +10% bonus physical damage amplification.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Spawns a Mud Golem for every unit stunned by Stone Gaze.

name: Summon Familiars
description: Conjures blind Familiars to fight for the hero. Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing. While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.
differences: Familiars have double their normal HP
superUpgrade: Super: +2 familiars.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants the hero Stone Form and Silent as the Grave.

name: Summon Spirit Bear
description:
Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.
Spirit Bear has the Entangling Root ability.
differences: Has no leash by default. Lives independently from caster.
superUpgrade: Super: +25 Spirit Bear Movement speed, +8 Spirit Bear Armor, 0s Entangle Cooldown, +1000 Spirit Bear Health, -0.1 Spirit Bear Attack Time.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Assault Cuirass, Mask of Madness and Skull Basher.

name: Summon Wolves
description: Summons two wolves to fight for the caster. Level 3-4 wolves have Permanent Invisibility, and level 4 wolves have Cripple.
superUpgrade: Super: Summons 2 extra wolves
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Also summons a Big Bad Wolf in addition to the regular wolves (5x stats of regular wolf) that apply Howl on attack (4s debuff)

name: Sun Ray
description: The hero expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.
superUpgrade: Super: +1.5% max health damage, +1.5% max health heal, grants Holy Locket
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Sun Ray instead spawns a Supernova that casts Sun Ray, exploding at the end of the duration.

name: Sunder
description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
superUpgrade: Super: -34s cooldown. -0.2s cast point.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Dagon 5 is cast on target (deals 800 damage after the health swap).

name: Tag Team
description: Temporarily applies a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts 5 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases bonus damage by 25 and duration by 5.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Increases radius by 400 and attacked units are stunned for 0.2s.

name: Take Aim
description: Extends the attack range of this hero's weapon.
differences: Doesn't has an active component.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Concussive Grenade.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Attacks also proc Assassinate on the target. 5s cooldown.

name: Tether
description: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, the tethered unit gains a portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
superUpgrade: Super: Enemies crossing the tether also get stunned for 1.75 seconds and receive 150 magic damage. +12% movement speed.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: The caster attacks their tethered ally's target whenever their ally attacks.

name: Tidebringer
description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
superUpgrade: Super: Cooldown reduced by -2 seconds.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: +100% Tidebringer Cleave

name: Time Lock
description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases the bonus damage by 70.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Applies Time Lock in 400 AoE every 4s.

name: Time Walk
description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: Reduces cooldown by 1.5 seconds, +0.5 backtrack duration, 20% chance to dodge damage for 2 seconds after casting.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Passive 40% damage dodge chance.

name: Torrent
description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases radius by 80, damage by 100 and stun duration by 0.4s.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Also casts Torrent Storm.

name: Toss
description: Grabs the nearest enemy unit in a 275 radius around the caster and launches it at the target unit to deal damage where they land. The tossed unit will take an extra 30% damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Blink to the caster as well as applying a 30% movement slow and 30% miss chance to the tossed unit for 2 seconds. The debuff is applied after the tossed unit lands.
