gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Tosses all units within 300 radius of the caster.

name: Trample
description: Primal Beast stomps over everything. For every 140 units traveled, all enemies around the Beast receive damage. Deals base damage plus a multiplier of Primal Beast's attack damage. Primal Beast is disarmed for the duration of the ability.
differences: Deals slightly reduced damage.
superUpgrade: Super: +25% attack damage multiplier, +70 damage radius.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants Kaya and Sange. Procs attack modifiers.

name: Tricks of the Trade
description: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy heroes from behind in an area around him.
differences: Has a greatly increased cast point.
superUpgrade: Super: Grants Battlefury. Increases cast range by 300.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Increases the number of attacks by 1. Hits 1 extra target per attack.

name: Unleash
description:
Marci taps a hidden power, gaining Fury charges that allow her to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes that slow movement and attack speed of the target for 2s. The last strike in every Fury combo creates a damaging pulse around the target. In between Fury combos, Marci is unable to attack for 1.5s.

Marci gains 15% movement speed when Unleash is cast.
superUpgrade: Super: Pulses silence for 1.5 seconds.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Cooldown reduced by 10 seconds. While Unleash is active, casting spells creates a pulse.

name: Uproar
description:
The Beast's temper passively provides bonus damage. Additionally, for every instance of 50 damage or more Primal Beast takes from enemy heroes, he accumulates stacks of Uproar. 

When activated, Primal Beast releases a roar that slows surrounding enemies and grants the Beast additional attack damage and armor for 7 seconds based on his current stacks of Uproar.
superUpgrade: Super: Uproar now Hard Dispels, and is automatically activated whenever it reaches max stacks.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Upon cast, the caster releases 3 waves of 2 projectiles per stack of uproar each in a circle around them. Projectiles deal 100 damage and Break enemies for 2.5s. After a short delay, each projectile splinters in two.

name: Vacuum
description: Creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
differences: Has reduced radius.
superUpgrade: Super: +100 AoE, -15 cooldown.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: After vacuum, caster appears in the epicenter and applies Normal Punch to enemies affected

name: Vampiric Spirit
description: Restore health based on the damage the caster deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. Skeletons respawn once when killed.
differences: Always summons all the possible skeletons.
superUpgrade: Super: Skeletons gains 24 attack damage, and 100% health.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Skeletons respawn indefinitely. When skeletons respawn, they cast level 2 Wraithfire Blast on a random enemy hero (global range).

name: Vengeance Aura
description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases bonus damage by 16%.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of the owner that deals and takes full damage and can cast all of their abilities (except passives that do not work on illusions). Illusion has 12% movement speed bonus.

name: Venomous Gale
description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement. Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
superUpgrade: Super: Cooldown reduced by 6 seconds, gains +400 cast range, decreases affected units' attack speed by 10%, impact damage deals 2x more damage.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Venomous Gale now reduces affected units' status resistance by 40%.

name: Viscous Nasal Goo
description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed. Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.
differences: Cast point removed.
superUpgrade: Super: Becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range. Increases Stack Limit to 7.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Also applies to allies, gaining the reverse effect.

name: Walrus PUNCH!
description: The hero connects with their mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.
superUpgrade: Super: +0.4s air time, and grants Silver Edge.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Gains a 20% chance to proc a Walrus Punch on the enemy.

name: Warcry
description: The hero's Warcry heartens their allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 9 seconds.
superUpgrade: Super: +10 bonus armor, +3s duration, +20% movement speed.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Units affected by Warcry gain damage equal to 2x their armor.

name: Warpath
description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.
superUpgrade: Super: Has infinite duration, and can stack infinitely.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants 5% lifesteal per stack.

name: Wave of Terror
description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases armor reduction by 2 and steals 20% of enemy hero base damage and base armor for the duration of the debuff.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Enemies struck with Wave of Terror are also feared for 2 seconds.

name: Waveform
description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
superUpgrade: Super: Has 2 charges and increases cast range by 250.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Waveform attacks targets.

name: Wild Axes
description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
superUpgrade: Super: Increases axes damage by 30 and adds a 4% bonus to damage amplification.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Wild axes have no cooldown.

name: Windrun
description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
superUpgrade: Super: +2s duration.
gabenUpgrade: Gaben: Grants 2 charges.
